name: Guardian Of The Earth (AhmedTheGreat)
description:
A Game Created For GMTK Game Jam 2020. This Time The Theme Is "Out Of Control".

It's the year 2120. Exactly after one  hundred years of the pandemic COVID19, human race is facing a far bigger challenge. Earth's face is completely covered in the trash produced by human beings. Situation is totally OUT OF CONTROL. There is no place to live, to go and to breathe as the air is full of poisonous gases rising from decaying heaps of rubbish. All humans have left the earth and have taken refuge in the International Space Station. All except one: a little stout robot named Wall-E who is resolute to restore the beauty of the earth.

                                                                                                     --By Ahmed Hannan
